tit.cmt: 読みは「うじのかいたこのひめみこ」となっていますので、そちらをローマ字に当てています。尚、皇女はひめみこ、皇子はみことしています（同一ファイル内にひめみことおうじょ、みことおうじが混在するのを避けるためです。）

sen.j: 菟道貝蛸皇女（うじのかいたこのひめみこ）
敏達天皇と推古天皇の子。
sen.e: She was a daughter between the Emperor Bidatsu and Empress Suiko.
She was a daughter between the Emperor Bidatsu and the Empress Suiko.
She was a daughter between the Emperor Bidatsu and the Empress Suiko.

sen.j: 聖徳太子の妃だが、結婚後まもなく逝去したと思われる。
sen.e: She was a wife of Prince Shotoku, but it is believed that she died shortly after her marriage.
She was a wife of the Prince Shotoku, but it is believed that she died shortly after her marriage.
She was a wife of the Prince Shotoku, but it is believed that she died shortly after her marriage.

sen.j: 同母弟に竹田皇子・尾張皇子（聖徳太子の妃橘大郎女の父）、同母妹に小墾田皇女（押坂彦人大兄皇子妃）・田眼皇女（後の舒明天皇妃）がいる。
sen.e: Her younger maternal half-brothers were Takeda no miko (Prince Takeda), and Owari no miko (Prince Owari), and her younger maternal half-sisters were Oharida no himemiko Princess Oharida, who was a wife of OSHISAKA no Hikohito no Oenomiko) and Tame no himemiko (Princess Tame, who became a wife of the Emperor Jomei later).

Her younger brothers-uterine were Takeda no miko (the Prince Takeda), and Owari no miko (the Prince Owari, the father of TACHIBANA no Ooiratsume, a wife of the Prince Shotoku), and her younger sisters-uterine were Oharida no himemiko, the Princess Oharida (a wife of OSHISAKA no Hikohito no Oenomiko) and Tame no himemiko (the Princess Tame, who became a wife of the Emperor Jomei later).
sen.cmt: younger maternal half-brothers→younger brothers-uterine と修正しました。the を補いました。（聖徳太子の妃橘大郎女の父）を補いました。younger maternal half-sisters→younger sisters-uterine と修正しました。the, カンマを補いました。カッコ部分を修正しました。
sen.e: Her younger brothers-uterine were Takeda no miko (the Prince Takeda), and Owari no miko (the Prince Owari, the father of TACHIBANA no Ooiratsume, a wife of the Prince Shotoku), and her younger sisters-uterine were Oharida no himemiko, the Princess Oharida (a wife of OSHISAKA no Hikohito no Oenomiko) and Tame no himemiko (the Princess Tame, who became a wife of the Emperor Jomei later).
